00031 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LQUOTA
00032 
00033 #include <lustre_net.h>
00034 #include <lustre_import.h>
00035 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00036 #include <obd_class.h>
00037 
00038 #include "qsd_internal.h"
00039 
00040 struct qsd_async_args {
00041         struct obd_export     *aa_exp;
00042         struct qsd_qtype_info *aa_qqi;
00043         void                  *aa_arg;
00044         struct lquota_lvb     *aa_lvb;
00045         struct lustre_handle   aa_lockh;
00046         qsd_req_completion_t   aa_completion;
00047 };
00048 
00049 /*
00050  * non-intent quota request interpret callback.
00051  *
00052  * \param env    - the environment passed by the caller
00053  * \param req    - the non-intent quota request
00054  * \param arg    - qsd_async_args
00055  * \param rc     - request status
00056  *
00057  * \retval 0     - success
00058  * \retval -ve   - appropriate errors
00059  */
00060 static int qsd_dqacq_interpret(const struct lu_env *env,
00061                                struct ptlrpc_request *req, void *arg, int rc)
00062 {
00063         struct quota_body     *rep_qbody = NULL, *req_qbody;
00064         struct qsd_async_args *aa = (struct qsd_async_args *)arg;
00065         ENTRY;
00066 
00067         req_qbody = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00068         if (rc == 0 || rc == -EDQUOT || rc == -EINPROGRESS)
00069                 rep_qbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill,
00070                                                    &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00071         aa->aa_completion(env, aa->aa_qqi, req_qbody, rep_qbody, &aa->aa_lockh,
00072                           NULL, aa->aa_arg, rc);
00073         RETURN(rc);
00074 }
00075 
00076 /*
00077  * Send non-intent quota request to master.
00078  *
00079  * \param env    - the environment passed by the caller
00080  * \param exp    - is the export to use to send the acquire RPC
00081  * \param qbody  - quota body to be packed in request
00082  * \param sync   - synchronous or asynchronous
00083  * \param completion - completion callback
00084  * \param qqi    - is the qsd_qtype_info structure to pass to the completion
00085  *                 function
00086  * \param lqe    - is the qid entry to be processed
00087  *
00088  * \retval 0     - success
00089  * \retval -ve   - appropriate errors
00090  */
00091 int qsd_send_dqacq(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_export *exp,
00092                    struct quota_body *qbody, bool sync,
00093                    qsd_req_completion_t completion, struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
00094                    struct lustre_handle *lockh, struct lquota_entry *lqe)
00095 {
00096         struct ptlrpc_request   *req;
00097         struct quota_body       *req_qbody;
00098         struct qsd_async_args   *aa;
00099         int                      rc;
00100         ENTRY;
00101 
00102         LASSERT(exp);
00103 
00104         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp), &RQF_QUOTA_DQACQ);
00105         if (req == NULL)
00106                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00107 
00108         req->rq_no_resend = req->rq_no_delay = 1;
00109         req->rq_no_retry_einprogress = 1;
00110         rc = ptlrpc_request_pack(req, LUSTRE_MDS_VERSION, QUOTA_DQACQ);
00111         if (rc) {
00112                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00113                 GOTO(out, rc);
00114         }
00115 
00116         req->rq_request_portal = MDS_READPAGE_PORTAL;
00117         req_qbody = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00118         *req_qbody = *qbody;
00119 
00120         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00121 
00122         CLASSERT(sizeof(*aa) <= sizeof(req->rq_async_args));
00123         aa = ptlrpc_req_async_args(req);
00124         aa->aa_exp = exp;
00125         aa->aa_qqi = qqi;
00126         aa->aa_arg = (void *)lqe;
00127         aa->aa_completion = completion;
00128         lustre_handle_copy(&aa->aa_lockh, lockh);
00129 
00130         if (sync) {
00131                 rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00132                 rc = qsd_dqacq_interpret(env, req, aa, rc);
00133                 ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00134         } else {
00135                 req->rq_interpret_reply = qsd_dqacq_interpret;
00136                 ptlrpcd_add_req(req);
00137         }
00138 
00139         RETURN(rc);
00140 out:
00141         completion(env, qqi, qbody, NULL, lockh, NULL, lqe, rc);
00142         return rc;
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*
00146  * intent quota request interpret callback.
00147  *
00148  * \param env    - the environment passed by the caller
00149  * \param req    - the intent quota request
00150  * \param arg    - qsd_async_args
00151  * \param rc     - request status
00152  *
00153  * \retval 0     - success
00154  * \retval -ve   - appropriate errors
00155  */
00156 static int qsd_intent_interpret(const struct lu_env *env,
00157                                 struct ptlrpc_request *req, void *arg, int rc)
00158 {
00159         struct lustre_handle     *lockh;
00160         struct quota_body        *rep_qbody = NULL, *req_qbody;
00161         struct ldlm_intent       *lit;
00162         struct qsd_async_args    *aa = (struct qsd_async_args *)arg;
00163         __u64                     flags = LDLM_FL_HAS_INTENT;
00164         ENTRY;
00165 
00166         LASSERT(aa->aa_exp);
00167         lockh = &aa->aa_lockh;
00168         req_qbody = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00169         lit = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LDLM_INTENT);
00170 
00171         rc = ldlm_cli_enqueue_fini(aa->aa_exp, req, LDLM_PLAIN, 0, LCK_CR,
00172                                    &flags, (void *)aa->aa_lvb,
00173                                    sizeof(struct lquota_lvb), lockh, rc);
00174         if (rc < 0)
00175                 /* the lock has been destroyed, forget about the lock handle */
00176                 memset(lockh, 0, sizeof(*lockh));
00177 
00178         if (rc == 0 || rc == -EDQUOT || rc == -EINPROGRESS)
00179                 rep_qbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill,
00180                                                    &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00181 
00182         aa->aa_completion(env, aa->aa_qqi, req_qbody, rep_qbody, lockh,
00183                           aa->aa_lvb, aa->aa_arg, rc);
00184         RETURN(rc);
00185 }
00186 
00187 /*
00188  * Get intent per-ID lock or global-index lock from master.
00189  *
00190  * \param env    - the environment passed by the caller
00191  * \param exp    - is the export to use to send the intent RPC
00192  * \param qbody  - quota body to be packed in request
00193  * \param sync   - synchronous or asynchronous (pre-acquire)
00194  * \param it_op  - IT_QUOTA_DQACQ or IT_QUOTA_CONN
00195  * \param completion - completion callback
00196  * \param qqi    - is the qsd_qtype_info structure to pass to the completion
00197  *                 function
00198  * \param lvb    - is the lvb associated with the lock and returned by the
00199  *                 server
00200  * \param arg    - is an opaq argument passed to the completion callback
00201  *
00202  * \retval 0     - success
00203  * \retval -ve   - appropriate errors
00204  */
00205 int qsd_intent_lock(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_export *exp,
00206                     struct quota_body *qbody, bool sync, int it_op,
00207                     qsd_req_completion_t completion, struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
00208                     struct lquota_lvb *lvb, void *arg)
00209 {
00210         struct qsd_thread_info  *qti = qsd_info(env);
00211         struct ptlrpc_request   *req;
00212         struct qsd_async_args   *aa = NULL;
00213         struct ldlm_intent      *lit;
00214         struct quota_body       *req_qbody;
00215         __u64                    flags = LDLM_FL_HAS_INTENT;
00216         int                      rc;
00217         ENTRY;
00218 
00219         LASSERT(exp != NULL);
00220         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(&qbody->qb_lockh));
00221 
00222         memset(&qti->qti_lockh, 0, sizeof(qti->qti_lockh));
00223 
00224         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp),
00225                                    &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_QUOTA);
00226         if (req == NULL)
00227                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00228 
00229         req->rq_no_retry_einprogress = 1;
00230         rc = ldlm_prep_enqueue_req(exp, req, NULL, 0);
00231         if (rc) {
00232                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00233                 GOTO(out, rc);
00234         }
00235         req->rq_request_portal = MDS_READPAGE_PORTAL;
00236 
00237         lit = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LDLM_INTENT);
00238         lit->opc = (__u64)it_op;
00239 
00240         req_qbody = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00241         *req_qbody = *qbody;
00242 
00243         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_DLM_LVB, RCL_SERVER,
00244                              sizeof(*lvb));
00245         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00246 
00247         switch(it_op) {
00248         case IT_QUOTA_CONN:
00249                 /* build resource name associated with global index */
00250                 fid_build_reg_res_name(&qbody->qb_fid, &qti->qti_resid);
00251 
00252                 /* copy einfo template and fill ei_cbdata with qqi pointer */
00253                 memcpy(&qti->qti_einfo, &qsd_glb_einfo, sizeof(qti->qti_einfo));
00254                 qti->qti_einfo.ei_cbdata = qqi;
00255 
00256                 /* don't cancel global lock on memory pressure */
00257                 flags |= LDLM_FL_NO_LRU;
00258                 break;
00259         case IT_QUOTA_DQACQ:
00260                 /* build resource name associated for per-ID quota lock */
00261                 fid_build_quota_res_name(&qbody->qb_fid, &qbody->qb_id,
00262                                          &qti->qti_resid);
00263 
00264                 /* copy einfo template and fill ei_cbdata with lqe pointer */
00265                 memcpy(&qti->qti_einfo, &qsd_id_einfo, sizeof(qti->qti_einfo));
00266                 qti->qti_einfo.ei_cbdata = arg;
00267                 break;
00268         default:
00269                 LASSERTF(0, "invalid it_op %d\n", it_op);
00270         }
00271 
00272         /* build lock enqueue request */
00273         rc = ldlm_cli_enqueue(exp, &req, &qti->qti_einfo, &qti->qti_resid, NULL,
00274                               &flags, (void *)lvb, sizeof(*lvb), LVB_T_LQUOTA,
00275                               &qti->qti_lockh, 1);
00276         if (rc < 0) {
00277                 ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00278                 GOTO(out, rc);
00279         }
00280 
00281         /* grab reference on backend structure for the new lock */
00282         switch(it_op) {
00283         case IT_QUOTA_CONN:
00284                 /* grab reference on qqi for new lock */
00285 #ifdef USE_LU_REF
00286         {
00287                 struct ldlm_lock        *lock;
00288 
00289                 lock = ldlm_handle2lock(&qti->qti_lockh);
00290                 if (lock == NULL) {
00291                         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00292                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOLCK);
00293                 }
00294                 lu_ref_add(&qqi->qqi_reference, "glb_lock", lock);
00295                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
00296         }
00297 #endif
00298                 qqi_getref(qqi);
00299                 break;
00300         case IT_QUOTA_DQACQ:
00301                 /* grab reference on lqe for new lock */
00302                 lqe_getref((struct lquota_entry *)arg);
00303                 /* all acquire/release request are sent with no_resend and
00304                  * no_delay flag */
00305                 req->rq_no_resend = req->rq_no_delay = 1;
00306                 break;
00307         default:
00308                 break;
00309         }
00310 
00311         CLASSERT(sizeof(*aa) <= sizeof(req->rq_async_args));
00312         aa = ptlrpc_req_async_args(req);
00313         aa->aa_exp = exp;
00314         aa->aa_qqi = qqi;
00315         aa->aa_arg = arg;
00316         aa->aa_lvb = lvb;
00317         aa->aa_completion = completion;
00318         lustre_handle_copy(&aa->aa_lockh, &qti->qti_lockh);
00319 
00320         if (sync) {
00321                 /* send lock enqueue request and wait for completion */
00322                 rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00323                 rc = qsd_intent_interpret(env, req, aa, rc);
00324                 ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00325         } else {
00326                 /* queue lock request and return */
00327                 req->rq_interpret_reply = qsd_intent_interpret;
00328                 ptlrpcd_add_req(req);
00329         }
00330 
00331         RETURN(rc);
00332 out:
00333         completion(env, qqi, qbody, NULL, &qti->qti_lockh, lvb, arg, rc);
00334         return rc;
00335 }
00336 
00337 /*
00338  * Fetch a global or slave index from the QMT.
00339  *
00340  * \param env    - the environment passed by the caller
00341  * \param exp    - is the export to use to issue the OBD_IDX_READ RPC
00342  * \param ii     - is the index information to be packed in the request
00343  *                 on success, the index information returned by the server
00344  *                 is copied there.
00345  * \param npages - is the number of pages in the pages array
00346  * \param pages  - is an array of @npages pages
00347  *
00348  * \retval 0     - success
00349  * \retval -ve   - appropriate errors
00350  */
00351 int qsd_fetch_index(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_export *exp,
00352                     struct idx_info *ii, unsigned int npages,
00353                     struct page **pages, bool *need_swab)
00354 {
00355         struct ptlrpc_request   *req;
00356         struct idx_info         *req_ii;
00357         struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc;
00358         int                      rc, i;
00359         ENTRY;
00360 
00361         LASSERT(exp);
00362 
00363         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp), &RQF_OBD_IDX_READ);
00364         if (req == NULL)
00365                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00366 
00367         rc = ptlrpc_request_pack(req, LUSTRE_OBD_VERSION, OBD_IDX_READ);
00368         if (rc) {
00369                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00370                 RETURN(rc);
00371         }
00372 
00373         req->rq_request_portal = MDS_READPAGE_PORTAL;
00374         ptlrpc_at_set_req_timeout(req);
00375 
00376         /* allocate bulk descriptor */
00377         desc = ptlrpc_prep_bulk_imp(req, npages, 1,
00378                                     PTLRPC_BULK_PUT_SINK | PTLRPC_BULK_BUF_KIOV,
00379                                     MDS_BULK_PORTAL,
00380                                     &ptlrpc_bulk_kiov_pin_ops);
00381         if (desc == NULL) {
00382                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00383                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00384         }
00385 
00386         /* req now owns desc and will free it when it gets freed */
00387         for (i = 0; i < npages; i++)
00388                 desc->bd_frag_ops->add_kiov_frag(desc, pages[i], 0,
00389                                                  PAGE_CACHE_SIZE);
00390 
00391         /* pack index information in request */
00392         req_ii = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_IDX_INFO);
00393         *req_ii = *ii;
00394 
00395         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00396 
00397         /* send request to master and wait for RPC to complete */
00398         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00399         if (rc)
00400                 GOTO(out, rc);
00401 
00402         rc = sptlrpc_cli_unwrap_bulk_read(req, req->rq_bulk,
00403                                           req->rq_bulk->bd_nob_transferred);
00404         if (rc < 0)
00405                 GOTO(out, rc);
00406         else
00407                 /* sptlrpc_cli_unwrap_bulk_read() returns the number of bytes
00408                  * transferred*/
00409                 rc = 0;
00410 
00411         req_ii = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_IDX_INFO);
00412         *ii = *req_ii;
00413 
00414         *need_swab = ptlrpc_rep_need_swab(req);
00415 
00416         EXIT;
00417 out:
00418         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00419         return rc;
00420 }
